PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.DESCRICAO-DO-PROJETO: Este projeto visa desenvolver um sistema de aquisiзгo de dados, portбtil, para adquirir sinais elйtricos de tensгo e corrente com capacidade de se conectar com computadores PC compatнveis. Com base nas medidas fornecidas pelo equipamento, diversas anбlises podem ser realizadas com relaзгo as condiзхes das tensхes da rede, da carga ou mesmo das potкncias. Tais informaзхes sгo de extrema importвncia para concessionбrias de energia elйtrica sob a уtica de monitorar a qualidade da energia entregue aos consumidores. Adicionalmente, estas podem detectar se as perturbaзхes sгo causadas por ela ou pelo consumidor de forma a que as responsabilidades fiquem claramente atribuнdas. Como atualmente, tem-se um estнmulo а geraзгo distribuнda, esta anбlise se faz mister, principalmente devido ao fato de que em muitas fontes de energia elйtrica distribuнdas se faz uso de inversores, os quais introduzem distorзхes harmфnicas, se nгo corretamente controlados ou projetados. O protуtipo a ser desenvolvido constituirб um equipamento bastante ъtil para validaзгo dos resultados almejados.

AREA-DO-CONHECIMENTO-1.NOME-DA-SUB-AREA-DO-CONHECIMENTO: Eletrфnica Industrial, Sistemas e Controles Eletrфnicos

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS:
The impact of errors in the innovation correlation functions evaluation, related to the suboptimal filter, on the
identification of the optimum steady state Kalman filter gains is investigated. An identification algorithm proposed in the literature,
frequently quoted, is revisited and summarized. Then, equations describing this impact are developed. Simulation results are
presented to show this impact.

DADOS-BASICOS-DO-TRABALHO.TITULO-DO-TRABALHO: Modulaзгo e Controle de Retificadores/Inversores Monofбsicos Multinнveis NPC

DETALHAMENTO-DO-TRABALHO.TITULO-DOS-ANAIS-OU-PROCEEDINGS: CBA 2004 - XV Congresso Brasileiro de Automбtica

AREA-DO-CONHECIMENTO-1.NOME-DA-SUB-AREA-DO-CONHECIMENTO: Eletrфnica Industrial, Sistemas e Controles Eletrфnicos

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: Este artigo descreve o controle de retificadores/inversores monofбsicos multinнveis NPC. Sгo apresentados os procedimentos de projeto dos controladores de entrada, saнda e do barramento CC. A implementaзгo do algoritmo space-vector й desenvolvida de forma a mitigar o impacto das ondulaзхes e desequilнbrios do barramento CC na saнda e na entrada do retificador/inversor. Tambйm й proposta uma estratйgia de equilнbrio das tensхes dos capacitores do barramento CC. Esta estratйgia modifica a seqькncia de comutaзгo proveniente do algoritmo space-vector de forma a restabelecer o equilнbrio das tensхes do barramento CC.

DADOS-BASICOS-DO-TRABALHO.TITULO-DO-TRABALHO: Impact of Correlation Errors on the Optimum Kalman Filter Gain Identification in a Single Sensor Environment

DETALHAMENTO-DO-TRABALHO.NOME-DO-EVENTO: 39th IAS Annual Meeting
DETALHAMENTO-DO-TRABALHO.TITULO-DOS-ANAIS-OU-PROCEEDINGS: Conference Record of the 2004 IEEE Industry Applications Conference

AREA-DO-CONHECIMENTO-1.NOME-DA-SUB-AREA-DO-CONHECIMENTO: Eletrфnica Industrial, Sistemas e Controles Eletrфnicos

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: The impact of errors in the innovation correlation functions evaluation, related to the suboptimal filter, on the identification of the optimum steady state Kalman filter gains is investigated. This issue arises in all real time applications, where the correlations must be calculated from experimental data. An identification algorithm proposed in the literature, with formal proof of convergence, is revisited and summarized. Based on this algorithm, equations describing this impact are developed. Simulation results are presented and discussed. As contribution, experimental results of the identification algorithm, applied to estimate the states of a position servo systems, are presented.

DADOS-BASICOS-DO-TRABALHO.TITULO-DO-TRABALHO: Identification Procedure for Kalman Filter Tuning

DETALHAMENTO-DO-TRABALHO.NOME-DO-EVENTO: VI Induscon
DETALHAMENTO-DO-TRABALHO.TITULO-DOS-ANAIS-OU-PROCEEDINGS: VI Conferкncia Internacional de Aplicaзхes Industriais

AREA-DO-CONHECIMENTO-1.NOME-DA-SUB-AREA-DO-CONHECIMENTO: Eletrфnica Industrial, Sistemas e Controles Eletrфnicos

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS:
A procedure for tuning Kalman filters, in a straightforward manner (in the sense that no prior and time demanding stochastic modeling is required), is implemented and analysed. The algorithm was applied to a position servo system controlled by an adaptive control scheme. To provide de state estimates, needed by the control law, a Kalman filter is used. Experimental
results compares the state estimates with trial and error tuning and with tuning obtained by the algorithm analysed.

DADOS-BASICOS-DO-TRABALHO.TITULO-DO-TRABALHO: Sensorless Induction Motor Control Using Low Cost Electrical Sensors

DETALHAMENTO-DO-TRABALHO.NOME-DO-EVENTO: PESC 2005 - 36th IEEE Power Electronics Specialists Conference
DETALHAMENTO-DO-TRABALHO.TITULO-DOS-ANAIS-OU-PROCEEDINGS: Proceedings of PESC 2005

AREA-DO-CONHECIMENTO-1.NOME-DA-SUB-AREA-DO-CONHECIMENTO: Eletrфnica Industrial, Sistemas e Controles Eletrфnicos

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: This paper presents a sensorless control strategy for induction motors using low cost electrical sensors. The main contribution is the use of low cost electrical sensors. It is allowed thanks to the use of a linear Kalman filter. It is also presented a procedure to perform the tuning of the Kalman filter in order to achieve state estimates as close as possible to the optimal ones. A Robust Model Reference Adaptive Controller (RMRAC) is used to perform the tuning of a Model reference Controller (MRC) that controls the induction motors despite unmodeled dynamics.

DADOS-BASICOS-DO-TRABALHO.TITULO-DO-TRABALHO: Impact of Correlation Errors on Optimum Kalman Filter Matrices Gains Identification in Multicoordinate Systems

DETALHAMENTO-DO-TRABALHO.NOME-DO-EVENTO: ACC 2005 - American Control Conference 2005
DETALHAMENTO-DO-TRABALHO.TITULO-DOS-ANAIS-OU-PROCEEDINGS: Proceedings of ACC 2005

AREA-DO-CONHECIMENTO-1.NOME-DA-SUB-AREA-DO-CONHECIMENTO: Eletrфnica Industrial, Sistemas e Controles Eletrфnicos

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: This paper investigates the impact that errors in the innovation correlation calculations has upon the steadystate Kalman filter gain identification. This issue arises in all real time applications, where the correlations must be calculated from experimental data. The algorithm proposed by [1] is considered and equations describing the impact are established. Simulation results are presented and discussed. Finally, experimental results for the algorithm in [1], applied to estimate the states of a servo system, are presented.

DADOS-BASICOS-DO-TRABALHO.TITULO-DO-TRABALHO: Reference Generation for Harmonics Cancellation, Displacement Power Factor Correction and Unbalance Compensation under Unknown Fundamental Frequency

DETALHAMENTO-DO-TRABALHO.TITULO-DOS-ANAIS-OU-PROCEEDINGS: Proceedings of IECON 2005

AREA-DO-CONHECIMENTO-1.NOME-DA-SUB-AREA-DO-CONHECIMENTO: Eletrфnica Industrial, Sistemas e Controles Eletrфnicos

AREA-DO-CONHECIMENTO-2.NOME-DA-SUB-AREA-DO-CONHECIMENTO: Sistemas Elйtricos de Potкncia

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS:
This paper proposes schemes for current reference generation for shunt active filters under unknown fundamental
frequency. The schemes are based on the linear Kalman filter and provides current reference to compensate
harmonics, the displacement power factor related to the load and unbalance. Since the Kalman filter uses a mathematical
model that includes the value of the fundamental grid frequency and, in some applications, this value can vary, it
is necessary to update the filter model with the correct frequency value. Therefore, this paper also proposes the use
of on-line identification of the fundamental frequency of the power system. The identified frequency is used to update
the Kalman filter model.

DADOS-BASICOS-DO-TRABALHO.TITULO-DO-TRABALHO: Single and Three-Phase Kalman Filter Based Synchronization Methods

AREA-DO-CONHECIMENTO-1.NOME-DA-SUB-AREA-DO-CONHECIMENTO: Sistemas Elйtricos de Potкncia

AREA-DO-CONHECIMENTO-2.NOME-DA-SUB-AREA-DO-CONHECIMENTO: Eletrфnica Industrial, Sistemas e Controles Eletrфnicos

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS:
This paper proposes new single-phase and three-phase synchronization methods based on the Kalman filter.
The proposed schemes deal with signals containing harmonics and corrupted by measurement noise. The proposed three-phase synchronization method also consider unbalanced systems.

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS:
This paper presents direct field oriented control sensorless speed servo for induction motors where the main contribution is the use of low-cost electrical sensors. It is possible due the use of a linear Kalman filter. The current
estimates are used in a recursive least-square speed estimator. Moreover, estimated rotor flux provided by Kalman
filter helps to keep the flux and torque decoupling. As it is presented in this paper, with both techniques working together is possible to obtain good speed estimation with low noise level and computation effort, in spite of use current
transducer that cost just some cents. Some experimental results are presented to evaluate this proposal.

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS:
This paper proposes methods for current reference generation for shunt active power filter based on optimum
filtering theory. These methods incorporate possible frequency deviation of the fundamental grid frequency. The proposed methods are an extension of a recently proposed synchronization method named Kalman Filter-PLL (KF-PLL). In this paper it is shown that the KF-PLL can also be used to provide the current references for shunt active power filters. It is considered references generation for the following cases: harmonics cancelation,
harmonics and displacement power factor correction, harmonics and unbalance compensation and harmonics with unbalance and displacement power factor correction.

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: This paper extends the capabilities of a power quality analyzer recently proposed by the authors in order to provide accurate information about the powers in a polyphase system under distorted and unbalanced conditions. All information provided by the analyzer complies with the IEEE 1459-2000 standard. The voltage and current signals necessary to evaluate the powers are obtained by means of optimal filtering and several information about the voltage and current can also be obtained. To demonstrate the effectiveness of the proposed analyzer it was implemented in a fixed-point digital signal processor (TI-TMS320F2812) and experimental results are presented.

A topologia faz uso de um inversor de tensгo (VSI) trifбsico a quatro fios juntamente com um banco de baterias. Й dada кnfase ao cancelamento de harmфonicas de correntes e a correзгo do fator de potкncia de deslocamento. Isto permite que se obtenha o melhor compromisso possнvel entre resposta transitуria e rejeiзгo аs perturbaзхes na geraзгo destes sinais.

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: This paper proposes a tuning method for a linear quadratic regulator (LQR) and its application to Uninterruptible Power Supplies (UPS). A performance index is established based on the desired behavior of system variables, such as maximum values permitted on the states and control law saturation. The tuning method is based on the Q and R weighting matrices, which relate the energy of the state variables involved on the process. From this index it is possible to find an optimal point to reach the required performance. The design procedure is exemplified with an output voltage control of an Uninterruptible Power Supply and dynamic results are presented.

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS:
This paper presents the performance influences of the damping factor of a second order anti-aliasing filter in an active power filtering (APF) environment. For the studied plant,
due to the significative changes in the system response, it is shown that is very important the appropriated choice of this parameter. To analyze the differences among responses, when the anti-aliasing filter damping factor is varied, the APF systems are implemented using a proportional integral (PI) controller. The paper shows the low-pass filtering effect for two APF?s topologies: The first topology uses a mono-phase shunt Voltage Source
Inverter (VSI) to compensate a non-linear inductive/capacitive load; The second one uses a three-phase/three-legs active power filter, considering a three-phase rectified inductive load. At the end of the text, simulation results are presented in order to compare the performance of using different analog filter damping factors for the two APF systems, verifying their responses under high harmonic content.

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS:
This paper proposes a new modeling approach for power quality conditioning devices. This modeling allows the use of LQR controllers with better accuracy. It is due to the incorporation of the grid voltages mathematical model, usually considered as disturbances, in the description of the plant to be controlled. This method is feasible thanks to a reference generation scheme, recently proposed by the authors, based on the optimum filtering theory which provides the state space variables needed to represent the new plant state space model proposed. The reference generation mentioned above
also provides references for harmonics cancelation, displacement power factor correction and unbalance compensation. The power conditioning topology consists of a battery energy storage system (BESS), that uses a three-phase three-legs shunt Voltage Source Inverter (VSI) and a battery bank.

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: This paper proposes the implementation of a virtual energy analyzer using open source software. The analyzer uses the power definitions presented in the IEEE Standard 1459-2010. This standard defines the power measurement under sinusoidal, nonsinusoidal, balanced, and unbalanced conditions. The virtual analyzer uses the QT framework that provides easy cross platform compilation. Therefore, the software can be easily ported to different platforms such as Windows, Linux and Mac OS. C

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: This paper proposes an open source software implementation of an power analyzer, running in personal computers. The software uses the power definitions presented in the IEEE Standard 1459-2010. This standard defines the power measurement under sinusoidal, nonsinusoidal, balanced, and unbalanced conditions. The software uses the QT framework that provides easy cross platform compilation. Therefore, the software can be easily ported to different platforms such as Windows, Linux and Mac OS. Simulation and experimental results are presented to validate the proposal.

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: Este artigo apresenta a proposta de um carregador de baterias bidirecional isolado. O carregador estudado apresenta capacidade de fornecimento de potкncia de 4KVA em uma linha de e capacidade de carregamento de bateria de 192V a 4,5A. Para isolamento das baterias e melhorar a eficiкncia energйtica na conversгo foi utilizado um transformador planar, aliado ao chaveamento de transistores IGBTs e MOSFETs de baixas perdas. Para controle do fluxo energйtico em ambas as direзхes foi utilizado o conversor full-bridge, adequado ao nнvel de potкncia exigida no barramento de 400V. O carregamento das baterias poderб ser integrado а uma rede smart-grig, composta de fontes energйticas fotovoltaicas e/ou eуlicas, ou ser utilizado em sistemas UPS Conversгo Dupla, cuja carga й pouco tolerante a falhas de alimentaзгo. Testes de simulaзхes mostram que a topologia full-bridge pode apresentar uma boa eficiкncia em alta potкncia, se forem tomados certos cuidados no projeto como transistores de baixas perdas, tйcnicas de chaveamento adequadas, filtragens e o uso do transformador planar.

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: This paper presents a numerical comparison between the FFT and the Kalman filter applied for harmonic components detection in different situations of the grid operation. Some pitfalls of the FFT are showed and the results are compared with the Kalman filter approach. It is considered signals with step changes in amplitude, frequency and phase. An analysis of these results is made demonstrating the better behavior of the Kalman filter approach in comparison to the FFT.

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: Este artigo propхe um controle direto de campo orientado para um servo de velocidade sensorless usando motor de induзгo trifбsico. A principal motivaзгo deste artigo й a substituiзгo dos elementos de medida mais onerosos, encoder e sensores de efeito Hall, por sistemas de baixo custo. Isto й possнvel utilizando-se um algoritmo sensorless, sensores shunt de baixo custo e filtro de Kalman. O filtro de Kalman fornece estimativas de corrente que sгo utilizadas em um algoritmo do tipo mнnimos quadrados recursivo (RLS-Recursive Least-Square) para estimar a velocidade do rotor. Conforme descrito neste artigo, й possнvel trabalhar com ambas as tйcnicas e obter uma boa estimaзгo de velocidade com baixo nнvel de ruнdo e pequeno esforзo computacional. Resultados experimentais sгo apresentados para validar o trabalho proposto.

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS:
Single- and three-phase synchronisation methods based on optimum filtering theory are proposed. These methods are based mainly on the Kalman filter and are therefore termed Kalman filter-phase locked loop. They explicitly include in the problem formulation the presence of harmonics, voltage unbalance, measurement noise, transients and frequency deviation. Such perturbations degrade the performance of many synchronisation structures presented in literature. The formulation presented here makes the
synchronisation signals less sensitive to these perturbations. It is also shown that the proposed methods can be helpful by also providing the amplitude, instantaneous phase and frequency of grid voltages that can be useful for the analysis of power quality. Furthermore, the Kalman filter provides a way of obtaining the best compromise between transient response and measurement noise rejection for the synchronisation signals. The paper sets out the development of the proposed methods together with the choice of tuning parameters and their physical meaning. Simulations and experimental results using a DSP TMS320F2812 are presented to show the effectiveness of the proposed schemes.
INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES:
Single- and three-phase synchronisation methods based on optimum filtering theory are proposed. These methods are based mainly on the Kalman filter and are therefore termed Kalman filter-phase locked loop. They explicitly include in the problem formulation the presence of harmonics, voltage unbalance, measurement noise, transients and frequency deviation. Such perturbations degrade the performance of many synchronisation structures presented in literature. The formulation presented here makes the
synchronisation signals less sensitive to these perturbations. It is also shown that the proposed methods can be helpful by also providing the amplitude, instantaneous phase and frequency of grid voltages that can be useful for the analysis of power quality. Furthermore, the Kalman filter provides a way of obtaining the best compromise between transient response and measurement noise rejection for the synchronisation signals. The paper sets out the development of the proposed methods together with the choice of tuning parameters and their physical meaning. Simulations and experimental results using a DSP TMS320F2812 are presented to show the effectiveness of the proposed schemes.

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS:
Este trabalho apresenta uma investigaзгo sobre algumas tйcnicas de integraзгo de sensores, para a estimaзгo dos estados de um dado sistema dinвmico com modelo linear. As abordagens utilizadas sгo baseadas no filtro de Kalman. Sгo consideradas duas configuraзхes
para a integraзгo das informaзхes dos sensores: integraзгo centralizada e integraзгo distribuнda. Tais algoritmos consideram incertezas nas redes de comunicaзгo entre os sensores e o sistema de processamento central. Tambйm й investigado um algoritmo de identificaзгo dos ganhos уtimos dos filtros de Kalman, em regime, para um sistema de integraзгo distribuнda, baseado nas correlaзхes das inovaзхes. Como contribuiзхes, sгo desenvolvidas expressхes, para a quantificaзгo dos erros de identificaзгo dos ganhos уtimos dos filtros de Kalman, em regime, em funзгo dos erros na avaliaзгo das correlaзхes das inovaзхes. De inнcio, sгo obtidas expressхes, para o caso em que nгo existem incertezas nas redes de comunicaзгo e apenas um sensor й considerado. Este resultado й, entгo, generalizado, para o caso em que existem incertezas nas redes de comunicaзгo e mъltiplos sensores sгo considerados. Todos os algoritmos investigados sгo apresentados com detalhes de sua derivaзгo. De forma a facilitar a compreensгo das tйcnicas de estimaзгo utilizadas, a teoria de estimaзгo e do filtro de Kalman sгo brevemente apresentadas. Simulaзхes sгo utilizadas, para avaliar o desempenho dos algoritmos investigados.

AREA-DO-CONHECIMENTO-2.NOME-DA-SUB-AREA-DO-CONHECIMENTO: Sistemas Elйtricos de Potкncia

AREA-DO-CONHECIMENTO-3.NOME-DA-SUB-AREA-DO-CONHECIMENTO: Medidas Elйtricas, Magnйticas e Eletrфnicas; Instrumentaзгo

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS:
This paper proposes the kernel algorithm for power quality monitoring. The algorithm is based on optimum ﬁltering theory and are capable to provide several information of the power system grid voltage. It provides information about the fundamental component, harmonics and total harmonic distortion. It also identiﬁes the positive, negative and zero sequence components of the voltages. The instantaneous values of these information and their magnitudes are available. Additionally, instantaneous phase for fundamental voltages,
harmonics, positive, negative and zero sequence components are provided. Finally, frequency identiﬁcation is also focused.

DADOS-BASICOS-DA-APRESENTACAO-DE-TRABALH.TITULO: Electric Power Monitoring Based on Kalman Filter

AREA-DO-CONHECIMENTO-2.NOME-DA-SUB-AREA-DO-CONHECIMENTO: Medidas Elйtricas, Magnйticas e Eletrфnicas; Instrumentaзгo

AREA-DO-CONHECIMENTO-3.NOME-DA-SUB-AREA-DO-CONHECIMENTO: Sistemas Elйtricos de Potкncia

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: This paper extends the capabilities of a power quality analyzer recently proposed by the authors in order to provide accurate information about the powers in a polyphase system under distorted and unbalanced conditions. All information provided by the analyzer complies with the IEEE 1459-2000 standard. The voltage and current signals necessary to evaluate the powers are obtained by means of optimal ﬁltering and several information about the voltage and current can also be obtained. To demonstrate the eﬀectiveness of the proposed analyzer it was implemented in a ﬁxed-point digital signal processor (TI-TMS320F2812) and experimental results are presented.

DADOS-BASICOS-DA-APRESENTACAO-DE-TRABALH.TITULO: Controle RMRAC de um Sistema de Armazenamento de Energia a Bateria com Geraзгo Уtima de Referкncias

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: Neste artigo, um controlador robusto por modelo de referкncia (RMRAC) й aplicado no controle de um sistema de armazenamento de energia utilizando baterias ou BESS. A topologia faz uso de um inversor de tensгo (VSI) trifбsico a quatro ﬁos juntamente com um banco de baterias. Й dada кnfase ao cancelamento de harmфnicas de correntes e a correзгo do fator de potкncia de deslocamento. A geraзгo das referкncias de correntes й obtida atravйs de um mйtodo recentemente proposto e baseia-se na teoria de ﬁltragem уtima. Isto permite que se obtenha o melhor compromisso possнvel entre resposta transitуria e rejeiзгo аs perturbaзхes na geraзгo destes sinais.

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: This paper proposes new single-phase and three-phase synchronization methods based on the Kalman ﬁlter. The proposed schemes deal with signals containing harmonics and corrupted by measurement noise. The proposed three-phase synchronization method also consider unbalanced systems.

DADOS-BASICOS-DA-APRESENTACAO-DE-TRABALH.TITULO: Impact of Correlation Errors on Optimum Kalman Filter Matrices Gains Identification in Multicoordinate Systems

AREA-DO-CONHECIMENTO-1.NOME-DA-SUB-AREA-DO-CONHECIMENTO: Eletrфnica Industrial, Sistemas e Controles Eletrфnicos

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS:
This paper investigates the impact that errors in the innovation correlation calculations has upon the steady-state Kalman ﬁlter gain identiﬁcation. This issue arises in all real time applications, where the correlations must be calculated from experimental data. The algorithm proposed by [1] is considered and equations describing the impact are
established. Simulation results are presented and discussed. Finally, experimental results for the algorithm in [1], applied to estimate the states of a servo system, are presented.

DADOS-BASICOS-DA-APRESENTACAO-DE-TRABALH.TITULO: Modulaзгo e Controle de Retificadores/Inversores Monofбsicos Multinнveis

AREA-DO-CONHECIMENTO-3.NOME-DA-SUB-AREA-DO-CONHECIMENTO: Eletrфnica Industrial, Sistemas e Controles Eletrфnicos

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: Este artigo descreve o controle de retificadores/inversores monofбsicos multinнveis NPC. Sгo apresentados os procedimentos de projeto dos controladores de entrada, saнda e do barramento CC. A implementaзгo do algoritmo space-vector й desenvolvida de forma a mitigar o impacto das ondulaзхes e desequilнbrios do barramento CC na saнda e na entrada do retificador/inversor. Tambйm й proposta uma estratйgia de equilнbrio das tensхes dos capacitores do barramento CC. Esta estratйgia modifica a seqькncia de comutaзгo proveniente do algoritmo space-vector de forma a restabelecer o equilнbrio das tensхes do barramento CC.

DADOS-BASICOS-DA-APRESENTACAO-DE-TRABALH.TITULO: Identification Procedure for Kalman Filter Tuning

AREA-DO-CONHECIMENTO-1.NOME-DA-SUB-AREA-DO-CONHECIMENTO: Eletrфnica Industrial, Sistemas e Controles Eletrфnicos

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS:
A procedure for tuning Kalman ﬁlters, in a straightforward manner (in the sense that no prior and time demanding stochastic modeling is required), is implemented and analysed.
The algorithm was applied to a position servo system controlled by an adaptive control scheme. To provide de state estimates, needed by the control law, a Kalman ﬁlter is used. Experimental results compares the state estimates with trial and error tuning and with tuning obtained by the algorithm analysed.
